plot: The story of a young boy obsessed with placing pennies on the railroad tracks. This hobby is in fact tearing his family apart. Soon he meets a hobo which changes his life forever.
title: Rail Pennies
plot_es: The story of a young boy obsessed with placing pennies on the railroad tracks. This hobby is in fact tearing his family apart. Soon he meets a hobo which changes his life forever.
